skillTree.localised_description: As large as an Imperial warhorse and thrice as fierce – a most appropriate mount for a Night Goblin Warboss!

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: There is no one whom the Night Goblin Big Boss has faced and hasn’t ran away from – and no one whose back he has seen and hasn’t stabbed, and killed.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.localised_description: "None seez 'til I doez the deedz, an' den dem bonez will rot on da stonez!"

effects.description:
Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +20%
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.localised_description: You can’t trust ‘im. E’s a little bit woaah, a little bit Waaagh! Ya know? Well dodgy.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: The fact that Squigs and gobbos love them should serve as a warning to the more inherently sensible races.

attributes.bullet_text:
A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

skillTree.localised_description: "We 'aven't fed dese ones for a few days – lets release 'em on da enemy gitz, so dey can eat dere fill!"

effects.description:
Attribute: Vanguard Deployment for Squig Herd and Colossal Squig units
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Loner" for Squig Herd and Colossal Squig units
	(Hero's army)

enabled_if: No friendly units in ability range.

skillTree.localised_description: Only the bravest Night Goblins dare climb on the backs of the wildest Squigs. Finding such a gobbo is easier said than done!

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Frenzy" for Squig Hoppers and Mangler Squigs units
	(Hero's army)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

effects.description:
Attribute: Causes Fear for Squig Hoppers and Mangler Squigs units
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

skillTree.localised_description: Experienced Night Goblin Herders can spot a Squig with the temperament to be controlled... and know to stay well away from those that cant'!

effects.description:
HIDDEN - used in conjuction with squig recruit rank effect for merc squig units
	(Hero's army)

Recruit rank: +1 for Squig units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: It takes a lot of dirty tricks and a fair share of luck, but those who last this long are truly dangerous ladz to have around.

effects.description: Ability number of uses: +2 for "Squig Thinkin'"

skillTree.localised_description: A drawn blade should not be put away until slaked in blood.
This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!
"Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"
Whether a targeted slice to the throat, or a precision stab to the heart, this one knows how to kill!
Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
"The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud – these are the things that sustain me."
Never trap this one, when cornered they have nothing left to lose.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Someday he's gonna be a Boss. Can you believe someday we'll work for 'im?"

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -10% for Big 'Uns and Black Orc units
	(own army)

Recruit rank: +1 for Big 'Uns and Black Orc units
	(own army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: When you're clearly betterer than all the uvvers you need to shout the loudest, so everybody else knows you're the betterest.
"Dat a 'shroom in yer pouch? Give it! Give it to me!"

effects.description: Upkeep: -15% for Goblin and Night Goblin units

backgroundSkills.localised_description: You can't keep a good 'danca' down, especially when those drums start bangin'!

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: When a Warboss needs someone to talk, he calls on this "Boy wiv da extra pointy sticks".
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.
Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.
